titles.title: To You be the glory
It's Your blood that saved me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's Your blood that saved me
It's Your blood that never fails
Your sacrifice for all, made perfect on the cross
You opened up the way to eternal life

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
To You be the glory
To You be the praise
As we crown You with glory
We declare, God of heaven, You reign

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You alone are worthyYou deserve the highest praiseIn awe we stand amazed that You would take ourplaceYou opened up the way to eternal life

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Forever, forever
Forever You shall reign
x4
